description: The Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) is a widely used, dimensionless index that is indicative for vegetation density and is defined as NDVI=(NIR-Red)/(NIR+Red) where NIR corresponds to the reflectance in the near infrared bands, and Red to the reflectance in the red bands.
title: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index: global 10-daily (raster 333m) - version 2, Dec 2020

providers.name: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
providers.description: Copernicus Land Monitoring Service - VITO NV
